title: Thunderstorms, heavy rain forecast in Melaka, Johor until 2pm, says MetMalaysia
description: KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Meteorological Department (MetMalaysia) has issued a thunderstorm, heavy rain and strong winds warning in two states until 2pm on Tuesday (Dec 2). Read full story
content:
KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Meteorological Department (MetMalaysia) has issued a thunderstorm, heavy rain and strong winds warning in two states until 2pm on Tuesday (Dec 2).

de: Gewitter und starker Regen werden in Melaka, Johor bis 14 Uhr vorhergesagt, sagt MetMalaysia. KUALA LUMPUR: Das malaysische Wetteramt (MetMalaysia) hat in zwei Bundesstaaten bis Dienstag (2. Dezember) um 14 Uhr eine Warnung vor Gewitter, starkem Regen und starkem Wind herausgegeben. Lesen Sie die ganze Geschichte
en: Thunderstorms, heavy rain forecast in Melaka, Johor until 2pm, says MetMalaysia. KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Meteorological Department (MetMalaysia) has issued a thunderstorm, heavy rain and strong winds warning in two states until 2pm on Tuesday (Dec 2). Read full story
la: Tonitruum, pluviae graves in Melaka, Johor usque ad 2pm praesagio, dicit MetMalaysia. KUALA LUMPUR: Department of Malaysian Meteorologicum (MetMalaysia) tonitruum, pluviam gravem et ventos validos in duabus civitatibus observavit usque ad diem 2pm die Martis (Dec. 2). Read full story

title: Severe thunderstorm warning lifted for North Island but more wild weather on the way
description: Auckland could see marble-sized hail, small tornadoes and heavy rain tomorrow.
content:
A strong wind watch is also in place for Northland and Auckland for 10 hours from 8am. 
MetService is warning residents that there is a moderate chance for most of the day that there will be thunder… [+2207 chars]
de: Die Warnung vor schweren Gewittern für die Nordinsel wurde aufgehoben, aber es ist noch mehr wildes Wetter unterwegs. In Auckland könnte es morgen zu marmorgroßem Hagel, kleinen Tornados und starkem Regen kommen.
en: Severe thunderstorm warning lifted for North Island but more wild weather on the way. Auckland could see marble-sized hail, small tornadoes and heavy rain tomorrow.
la: Gravis tonitribus monitus Islandiam Septentrionalem levavit sed magis in viis tempestatibus feris. Auckland videre poterat grandinem marmorarium, minutas parvas et cras pluvias graves.
